trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing input languages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Brukes til behandling av inndata språk i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel.
trans-unit.target: Flere språk kan registreres ved hjelp av region og språk i Kontrollpanel.

trans-unit.source: From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages.
trans-unit.target: Fra kategorien språk "Text Services og inndata språk" Velg "detaljer-knappen for å registrere flere språk.

trans-unit.source: The following dialog appears.
trans-unit.target: Følgende dialogboksen vises.

trans-unit.source: ![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.")
trans-unit.target: ![Teksten tjenester og inndataene språk dialogboksen. ] (~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Teksten tjenester og inndataene språk dialogboksen.")

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for currently available input languages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en opplisting for øyeblikket inndata språk.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for currently available input languages, or **null** if no input languages are available.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting for inndata språk som støttes for øyeblikket, eller **null** Hvis ingen inndata språk er tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the input language manager associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: Henter transportbehandling inndata språket som er forbundet med den gjeldende konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref> object associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref> tilknyttet den gjeldende konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current input language.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det gjeldende inndataene språket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the currently selected input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer valgt inndata språk.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This property may not be set to **null**.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis til **null**.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
trans-unit.target: Starter når er gjort forsøk på å angi denne egenskapen **null**.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen for et avhengighetsobjekt med angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to retrieve the input language.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighetsobjekt som du vil hente det angitte språket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the input language for the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer inndata språket for det angitte avhengighet-objektet.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen for et avhengighetsobjekt med angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet-objektet som skal hente verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The current value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> for the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende verdi for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>for det angitte avhengighet-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change of input language is completed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en endring i inndataene språk er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change of input language is initiated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en endring i inndataene språk er startet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Registers an input language source with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en inndata språket kilde med den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the input language to register.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir inndata språket du vil registrere.

trans-unit.source: This object must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet må implementere i <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when inputLanguageSource is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when inputLanguageSource is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Report the completion of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterer fullføring av en endring i inndataene språket som den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer det nye inndataene språket.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer forrige språket som inndata.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Report the initiation of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rapporter for å starte en endring i inndataene språket som den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer det nye inndataene språket.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer forrige språket som inndata.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: **true** to indicate that the reported change of input language was accepted; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** til å angi at rapporterte endring av inndata språk er aksepterte; ellers, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>kobles til egenskap i objektet angitte avhengighet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighetsobjekt som du vil angi den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerer den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> dependency property on the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>avhengighetsegenskapen på det angitte avhengighet-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighetsobjekt som du vil angi verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property to.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi for å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>knyttet til å.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.
